timeline.bodyText: ❓ Can the formatter be changed to only use a two-space indent for multi-line annotations? It'd be nice to reduce the files changed by what looks like an arbitrary style change.
timeline.author: coyotesqrl

replies.bodyText: Won't changing the defaults make it drift from the various fmt IDE plugins?
replies.author: pklinef

replies.bodyText: Verified that the latest intellij plugin will format the same as the maven plugin. So need to be in sync on the versions. https://github.com/google/styleguide/blob/gh-pages/intellij-java-google-style.xml.
replies.author: shaundmorris

timeline.bodyText: ❓ Can the formatter be changed to keep the call to stream() on its own line for multiline streaming blocks? It'd be nice to reduce the files changed by what looks like an arbitrary style change.
timeline.author: coyotesqrl
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -242,8 +242,7 @@ protected void logIds(List<Metacard> metacards, String action) {
       LOGGER.debug(
           "content item(s) {} with id = {}",
           action,
-          metacards

timeline.message: DDF-5964 resolved conflicts on stream formatting
DDF-5964 resolved conflicts on stream formatting
